paper_abstract: Utilizing the notation in Refs. 10 and 11, we revisit general bipartite Bell state for any (d x d) dimensional systems. In particular, we bring out the conditions for general bipartite Bell state and find out the relation between general Bell states and the u(d) group. Furthermore, we construct local unitary complete set for quantum dense coding based on general Bell states.
paper_title: CONDITIONS FOR BIPARTITE GENERAL BELL STATES
